title: Biden’s Top Science Adviser Violated Workplace Behavior Rules, Officials Say
sub_head: Eric Lander apologizes to staff after a complaint and an investigation into his conduct
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden’s top science adviser violated the administration’s workplace policies, an internal investigation prompted by a complaint about his treatment of staff found, resulting in a formal apology, according to White House officials and others familiar with the matter.
Eric Lander, the director of the White House’s Office of Science and Technology Policy, apologized to staff in a Friday email. “It’s my responsibility to set a respectful tone for our community,” said the email, which was viewed by The Wall Street Journal. “It’s clear that I have not lived up to this responsibility.”
